pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Inequality Analysis in PySAL=====================================![tag](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/pysal/inequality?include_prereleases&sort=semver)[![Continuous Integration](https://github.com/pysal/inequality/actions/workflows/testing.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/pysal/inequality/actions/workflows/testing.yml)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pysal/inequality/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/pysal/inequality)[![Documentation](https://img.shields.io/static/v1.svg?label=docs&message=current&color=9cf)](http://pysal.org/inequality/)Methods for measuring spatial inequality.Installation------------Install inequality from PyPI by running:```$ pip install inequality ```Install inequality from conda-forge by running:```$ conda install -c conda-forge inequality ```#### Requirements- libpysal- numpy- scipyContribute----------PySAL-inequality is under active development and contributors are welcome.If you have any suggestion, feature request, or bug report, please open a new [issue](https://github.com/pysal/inequality/issues) on GitHub.
